name: should create a query with fantasy points from seasonlogs
description: Test case for should create a query with fantasy points from seasonlogs
expected_query: select "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points" AS "points_from_seasonlogs_0", "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points_per_game" AS "points_per_game_from_seasonlogs_0", "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points_rnk" AS "points_rnk_from_seasonlogs_0", "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points_pos_rnk" AS "points_pos_rnk_from_seasonlogs_0", "player"."pos" from "scoring_format_player_seasonlogs" as "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270" inner join "player" on "player"."pid" = "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."pid" where "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."scoring_format_hash" = 'ad64bf40cdfec0a1ebdf66453fa57687832f7556f3870251c044d5d270fc089e' and "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."year" = 2022 group by player.fname, player.lname, "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points", "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points_per_game", "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points_rnk", "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."points_pos_rnk", "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 DESC NULLS LAST, "t7e2e75ff9aa5325620aefc4868e65270"."pid" asc limit 500
